axis_entry.long_name: CloudSat simulator equivalent radar reflectivity factor

axis_entry.z_bounds_factors: a: lev_bnds b: b_bnds orog: orog
axis_entry.z_factors: a: lev b: b orog: orog

axis_entry.z_bounds_factors: a: lev_bnds b: b_bnds orog: orog

axis_entry.z_bounds_factors: sigma: sigma_bnds depth: depth z1: z1 z2: z2 a: a href: href k_c: k_c
axis_entry.z_factors: sigma: sigma depth: depth z1: z1 z2: z2 a: a_coeff href: href k_c: k_c

axis_entry.formula:
z(n,k,j,i) = eta(n,j,i)*(1+s(k)) + depth_c*s(k) + (depth(j,i)-depth_c)*C(k) 
 where 
 C(k)=(1-b)*sinh(a*s(k))/sinh(a) +
           b*(tanh(a*(s(k)+0.5))/(2*tanh(0.5*a)) - 0.5)
axis_entry.z_bounds_factors: s: lev_bnds eta: eta depth: depth a: a b: b depth_c: depth_c
axis_entry.z_factors: s: lev eta: eta depth: depth a: a_coeff b: b_coeff depth_c: depth_c

axis_entry.z_factors: sigma: lev eta: eta depth: depth

axis_entry.formula: for k <= nsigma: z(n,k,j,i) = eta(n,j,i) + sigma(k)*(min(depth_c,depth(j,i))+eta(n,j,i)) ; for k > nsigma: z(n,k,j,i) = zlev(k)
axis_entry.z_bounds_factors: sigma: sigma_bnds eta: eta depth: depth depth_c: depth_c nsigma: nsigma zlev: zlev_bnds
axis_entry.z_factors: sigma: sigma eta: eta depth: depth depth_c: depth_c nsigma: nsigma zlev: zlev
